creditline: Gift of Mrs. John S. Pillsbury Sr.
inscription:
Mark and Inscription

Engraved below the lip is a crest composed of a lion's head erased with baron's coronet above (But which is not the Montague crest).
markings:
Mark

Each piece is fully marked (Britannia standard) on underside of bowl.
object_name: Salt cellar, Set of six salt cellars
title: Salt cellar
